functions.name: create_note
functions.description: Adds a new entry to a notepad (creates notepad if it doesn't exist). Use this to categorize notes like 'Missions', 'Characters', 'Locations', etc.

content.description: The entry content to add to this notepad.

current_game.description: The currently playing game name for organizing notes by game.

functions.name: read_note
functions.description: Reads all entries from a notepad by notepad name.

title.description: The notepad name to read from (e.g., 'Missions', 'Characters').

current_game.description: The currently playing game name for organizing notes by game.

functions.name: list_notes
functions.description: Lists all available notepads with their entry counts for the current game.

current_game.description: The currently playing game name for organizing notes by game.

functions.name: delete_note
functions.description: Deletes an entire notepad by name.

current_game.description: The currently playing game name for organizing notes by game.

functions.name: search_notes
functions.description: Searches through notepad entries for matching text. Can search all notepads or a specific notepad.

query.description: The search query to find in notepad entries.

current_game.description: The currently playing game name for organizing notes by game.

functions.name: export_notes
functions.description: Exports notepads to human-readable text format on the Desktop. Can export a single notepad, all notepads from a game, or all notepads from all games.

scope.description: Export scope: 'notepad' (single notepad), 'game' (all notepads from current game), or 'all' (all notepads from all games). Default: 'game'.

title.description: The notepad name to export (required when scope is 'notepad').

current_game.description: The currently playing game name (required for 'notepad' and 'game' scope).

functions.name: clear_notes
functions.description: Clear notepads by moving them to a recycle bin for safe removal. Can clear all notepads from the current game or all games.

scope.description: Clear scope: 'game' (all notepads from current game) or 'all' (all notepads from all games). Default: 'game'.

current_game.description: The currently playing game name (required for 'game' scope).

functions.name: undo_clear
functions.description: Restore the most recently cleared notepads from the recycle bin. This can only be done once per clear operation.
